Text:
Lol... it's a TV show. You can't buy the DVD, you know. Also, I've heard Glenn talk about using DVRs to record the show; "Don't miss it!"

1) There's nothing to stop. It's fair use.
2) You can't stop TPB. Lol... read the legal threats section below.
3) Educate yourself next time. Maybe you won't seem quite so stupid.
